name: untitled
description:
as a person who come from a third world country , i getting used to see a subtitle whenever i saw a movie / video , it's made me realized how the text (subtitle) can giving any new context to an images , regardless of the original contexts .

i often put a random ;non related text on a random painting that i found (bought , traded , anything legal) so the juxtaposition between everything on the canvas can created a whole new meaning & context . depends on whomever seen the artwork , there is no right answer .

this time i used semi-abstract painting that i made on early 2021 .
